name: Wizard Of Fisk
description:
Olkius is a rookie wizard from a small place called Fisk. One day while doing his potion training session, he accidentally made a spell to create dragons and now the city is full of them! Now it's up to you to help him save the land of Fisk.

Artist: Camila Alves
Programmers: Eike Natan, Antônio Jorge Vilas-Bôas and Everton Toyama
Sound Designer: Daniel Caldas
